scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_Record-Route:] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=callee 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

BYE [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [$2] To: [$1] [last_Call-ID:] [routes] CSeq: 1 BYE Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Test Content-Length: 0
